string.text:
You've taken damage of some kind! In GAMMA you need to worry about your HP, and limb HP. 
 
 Your overall HP is represented by the outlined figure in your health HUD. When this drops to 0, you die. 
 
 You can recover HP by using medkits, paying a medic to heal you, or by standing next to a campfire and waiting.

GAMMA also tracks health for six different 'limbs'. These are your head, torso, right/left arms, and right/left legs. 
 
 Limb health must be first restored by using a temporary healing item, such as a medkit, bandages or a tourniquet. 
 Temporary health is represented by a yellow bar. Temporary health ticks down over time. 
 
 You can turn temporary health into regular white HP by using a post-healing item. Regular limb HP does not decrease over time. 
 
 Limbs can also be slowly healed by sleeping.

Recover HP by using healing items, waiting by a campfire, or by paying a medic for a full heal. /n /n Recover limb HP by using a temporary health item, then converting this temporary health to regular limb HP using a post-heal item. /n /n Remember that not all post-heal items work on every limb! Always read the item details.
